net.tridentsdk.server

Class TridentServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.server.TridentServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Server

    @ThreadSafe
public final class TridentServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Server
    The access base to internal workings of the server
